results.title: Inspirational 1" Magnets - set of 7
results.description:
This listing is for a cute set of magnets, set of 7.  These would look great in your kitchen or your office.  They would also make a cute gift!

These are all approx. 1" in diameter, 1/8" thick, with a flat metal backing . Each button is hand pressed by me with a professional button maker. Buttons are protected with a layer of clear mylar.  Each one is hand made and may vary a little bit from the one in the photo. Buttons are water resistant but complete submersion in water may damage them. 

These will ship in a padded envelope via USPS ground within 3-5 business days.

We have many styles available, please check out our shop!

Thanks for shopping with the Finicky Foxes!

results.title: Live Love Laugh with Butterflies Stencil by StudioR12 | Reusable Mylar Template | Use to Paint Wood Signs - Wall Art - Pallets - Pillows...
results.description:
Live Love Laugh with Butterflies - An inspirational word and art stencil with butterflies by our local artists!

Easy to use & reuse - quick, perfect letters & designs every time!

From crafts to cakes, walls to weddings - elevate your creative potential with stencils! Layer, emboss, revitalize, remodel, & explore a whole new world of artistic expression!Say it with a sign, jazz up a journal, personalize a planner, add flair to furniture, and much more.

Made from laser-cut translucent 7.5 mil Mylar (BOPET) plastic. Superior to vinyl - durable, non-toxic, chemical resistant, & food safe.Use over and over with proper care & cleaning. Soap & water clean-up. Non-adhesive, easy to position for no-mess use & storage.

Our stencils are created with care in our shop in Ohio, by a team that’s all about making the best stencils you’ve ever used.If you want a way to create projects that impress, without spending hours on tedious tracing and hand-cramping hard work, then stencils are for you!

Pro Stenciling Tips: Use painter’s tape to secure or mask off areas of the design For acrylics or other wet mediums, remove excess from the brush or applicator when loading. Apply mediums in multiple layers, as dryly as possible to prevent bleed-under. For dimensional mediums (i.e. pastes, frostings for cakes & cookies), apply with offset spatula or palette knife. Remove stencil by lifting straight up.

Stencil Care & Precautions: Wash with warm soap and water immediately after use. Wash before using with food or cosmetics. Do not use with ammonia-based cleaners, as it may damage the stencil. Do not expose to excessive heat or flame.  Parental supervision encouraged.

STYLE: Easily create perfect accessories to make your house a HOME | Great for Gifts or Shows
* PURPOSE: Craft your way- Stencils make it QUICK -PRECISE | Every project is a Beautiful Work of Art
* SURFACES: Boards - Canvas - Fabric | Small to Extra Large sizes for stenciling Walls and Furniture
* MATERIAL: Precise Laser-cut | USA MADE | Durable 7.5 mil mylar | Quality & Satisfaction guaranteed

results.title: Live Laugh Love Candle Set with Watercolor Rainbows, Birthday Present for Daughter, Valentines Gift for Mom,Sister,Friend,LGBTQCoworker,Boss
results.description:
The beautiful set of three rainbow watercolor design candles (choose your size) features the words 'live' 'laugh' and 'love.' Beside the beautiful labels designed by shop owner Vanessa Ottenbreit, these candle are pretty darn righteous. They contain pure essential oil and fragrance (the good stuff!) and soy wax that burns as smoothly and slowly as your favorite love song. Pick your own scent and size.

To top it all off, they come in a glass jar that you could give to your Aunt Judy and Uncle Ned to fill up with some bomb strawberry jam. Now what could be better than that? Yeah, exactly. 

Wholesale and bulk orders are welcome.

Three candles are included. Choose the size from the drop down menu. Select from the following:
______SIZES______
- 4 ounce (28-36 hours)
- 8 ounce (56-72 hours)
- 12 ounce (84-108 hours)
*Burn time is approximate and it's recommended you burn in 2 hour cycles

______ESSENTIAL OIL SCENTS______
In addition to smelling amazing, these essential oils can provide some amazing benefits.* They have a light aroma, not overpowering like many lab made scents. And without the toxic chemicals, your body will thank you.

- Lavender
promotes relaxation and believed to treat anxiety, allergies, depression, insomnia, eczema, nausea, and menstrual cramps

- Vanilla
boosting libidio, lowering blood pressure, reducing inflammation, reducing depression, relieving PMS symptoms

- Rose
reduce anxiety, stress, depression, and pain, boosts libidio

- Jasmine
antidepressant, aphrodisiac, helps with relaxation and sleep
  
- Mint
provides relief from headaches, stress, cold, cough, congestion, asthma, bronchitis and curbs appetite, improves concentration and alertness

- Unscented
for when you just want to enjoy just the light of the flame, unfiltered

*Please note that these are not medical claims. 
**Have another scent request? Send a message to: vohandmade@gmail.com

______THE SKINNY______
These candles are LIT! Why? I'm glad you asked. I could geek out on this for days, BUT I'm going to throw you the highlights, below:

______ESSENTIAL OILS______
- Inhaling the aromas from essential oils can stimulate areas of your limbic system, which is a part of your brain that plays a role in emotions, behaviors, sense of smell, and long-term memory. Plus, these oils have a variety of affects, from boosting libido, to reducing anxiety and stress, to giving relief from cough and congestion. 
- Are they pet safe? Some essential oils can be toxic for pets. The essential oils used in these candles are safe for animals at diluted levels. Even though these candles are diluted, as a pre-caution it's advised that you leave a door open so your pet can leave the room. 
* Compare with scented candles that are loaded with chemicals, according to the American Chemical Society. They can contain from 800 to 1,500 chemicals, each with unique profiles and characteristics, depending on the scent.

______SOY WAX______
- Burns cleanly and slowly
- Made with American grown soybeans (mostly from Illinois, Iowa, and Indiana)
- Carbon neutral
* Compare this to paraffin wax (used in most candles) which is a petroleum by-product created when crude oil is refined into gasoline. Burning paraffin can release carcinogens, agitating respiratory and heart problems.

______NATURAL COTTON WICK______
- Good burn stability
- Candles manufactured in the USA are required by law to have a wick made from cotton or paper. But about one out of three imported candles have wire wicks, composed of lead. When burned, these candles exceed the EPA standards for outdoor air. Lead poisoning has been linked to learning disabilities, hormone imbalance, and other health issues, and of course is dangerous for pets.

______REUSABLE JAR______
- Jar can be washed and re-used for canning, storing food, or supplies (think paperclips!)
- Glass can be recycled endlessly by crushing, blending, and melting it together with sand and other starting materials. Doing so benefits manufacturers, the environment, and consumers.

______WHAT MAKES THIS COMPANY AWESOME?______
- We believe that every person deserves the very best in life and have consciously chose to select only the ingredients we would want for ourselves and our families. 
- You care about the environment and we do to. This candle is designed to not end up in a landfill. 
- A woman owned business, run by a lady named Vanessa Ottenbreit - who also runs a kickass graphic design business over at: www.etsy.com/shop/vohandmade
- Small business (your money goes directly into the hands of those working their booties off, not the CEO of a giant corporation)
- Hand poured artisan candles made with love, thoughtful care, and killer pop songs
- Original label artwork (no clipart here). This is ETSY after all.
- Made in Eugene, Oregon, USA, Planet Earth. We are one.

Questions? Don't hesitate to reach out:
vohandmade@gmail.com

Live Laugh Love Candle Set with Watercolor Rainbows, Birthday Present for Daughter, Valentines Gift for Mom,Sister, Friend,LGBTQCoworker,Boss

results.title: Die. Cry. Hate. - Wall Art - Dark Humor - Sign
Eggster's Giggles Series - From the Fountain of Goof (F.O.G. Tv Network)
results.description:
Eggster's Giggles Series - The Fountain of Goof (FOG T.V. Network)

1.  The paper boy - one who makes cute origami art.

2.  Don't Worry, Be Healthy Organic Food Market

3.  Always On The Rob 24-Hr. Security Surveillance Systems.

4.  Today is a good day to be happy.

5.  Breaking News:  Naked man seen running at the hike and bike trail.  He was last seen wearing his birthday suit, a happy grin and his behavior displayed a natural sense of freedom...as well of causing multiple blushes, smiles and unexpected bursts of laughter.

If you see this guy, please call the authorities.  He is considered warmed and mane-dress.  A reward of $1.50 if he is caught and vailed...correction...jailed.

Identification:  Tall, slender and has tatoos on his buttocks.  
Left side:  "Scratch and Sniff"
Right side: "Bite Me"

em crabby


p.s.  the items in the picture are not for sale in this post...just the list of puns.

Support Operation SmileNote:  Please use MEMO, an editor writing software, in oder to open this digital file.

results.title: Live Love Laugh Tumbler Decal ~ Choose Decal Colors and Size - Glass Not Included
results.description:
Custom decals personalized and made to order. Handmade decals by Cover Your Glass are available in multiple sizes. If you do not see a listing for the size that you need, just let us know and we will create a custom listing for you. Please contact us with any of your decal questions.

Personalize your wine glasses, car windows, Yeti tumblers or RTIC cups with decals by Cover Your Glass. Decals may also be used on laptop computers, phone cases, water bottles, mugs, etc. 

Cover Your Glass vinyl decals are computer die-cut with no background using vinyl material with a quality expectancy of 6 years of outdoor use. No background means that only the colored portion is the decal. Currently we carry 21 colors of vinyl with glitter and print vinyl being added to our options. Easy to apply. Simple application instructions included. Decals can be applied to most smooth flat surfaces such as windows, glass, stainless steel, etc. Decals placed on drinking glasses should be hand washed only. Please contact us at Cover Your Glass for quotes on your unique decal project. Made in the USA. 

We try to ship all orders within 1 to 2 business days.

For decals which have a name or monogram that overlaps a picture, please do not choose the same color for the name and the picture. If they are both the same color it may be difficult to read. 

Standard monogram format for decals that include a monogram is: first name initial, last name initial, then middle name initial. The last name initial will appear in the center and it will be larger than the other two initials. Monogram letters will be printed in the order that you provide them in.

Some photos may have Yeti cups, water bottles or other stock images for presentation purposes only. This listing is for a decal only, cup or mug not included. 

We specialize in travel tumbler decals but would be happy to assist you to design a custom decal that meets your needs. Cover Your Glass decals can be used for stainless steel tumblers, cups, mugs, glasses, champagne flutes, hydro flasks, water bottles, tablets, car windows, or most any smooth flat surface. We also offer a number of wedding and anniversary decals. Decals are a great gift for holidays, Christmas, birthday, graduation, anniversary, wedding party, bridesmaids, groomsmen, teachers, etc.
